evaluations.title: RAILGUN
evaluations.description: A privacy system for Ethereum using zk-SNARKs to shield ERC-20 tokens and ETH inside a smart contract, enabling private transfers and shielded DeFi interactions.

evaluations.title: Tornado Cash
evaluations.description: A non-custodial, Ethereum-based mixer that uses zk-SNARKs to break the on-chain link between deposit and withdrawal addresses for fixed-denomination ETH and ERC-20 deposits.

evaluations.title: Privacy Pools
evaluations.description: A privacy protocol that extends Tornado Cash with association set providers (ASPs), allowing users to prove membership in compliant subsets without revealing their identity.

evaluations.title: Intmax
evaluations.description: A stateless zkRollup optimised for private payments, pushing most data off-chain so that on-chain costs are minimal while preserving user-side privacy through client-side proving.
